name: Thorgate Ventures
description: We are the seed stage venture capital arm of Thorgate, doing up to four hands-on investments per year, mostly into scalable B2B solutions.
investmentAreas: B2B, Technology, Fintech, Energy, Real Estate

name: The Better Fund
description: ESG-focused fund, helping female-founders and gender-balanced teams in the BaltiNordics get access to capital to scale world-changing ideas
investmentAreas: Emerging Technologies Data & Platforms Digital Transformation, Health Tech Mental Health Sports & Fitness, Cleantech Greentech Sustainable Energy, Digital Learning ICT in Education Learning Technology

name: Metaplanet
description: Metaplanet is an early-stage investment firm making long-term bets on contrarians and leveraging the knowledge and network across sectors. We back mission-driven founders working on positively disruptive deep technologies.

name: Trind VC
description: 55m Estonian VC fund, investing in early-stage European software startups with Consumer and Community components, including marketplaces, Consumer Tech and B2B companies with short sales cycles. Currently investing out of Fund II, launched in 2022. Investing in pre-seed, seed and early series A startups, with ticket size between 100k-1meur and follow-on capacity of up to 5meur. Investment team of 8 people with offices in Estonia, Finland and Germany.

name: Breakaway Partners
description: Cross Ocean Ventures is the premier early-stage investor for ambitious high-growth technology companies that got their start in Europe and Israel. - That now plan to launch or expand their footprint in the US market. - And are currently on a feasible growth path to receive US Venture Capital led Series-A funding within the next 12-24 months.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Employment, Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Machine Learning, Medical, PaaS, SaaS, Software

name: Honey Badger Capital
description: We invest between 50k€-150k€ to startups along with access to our extensive network and know-how. We work together with an extended group of Pipedrive Angels who have the option to also join the investments we make which can bring the total amount invested up.
investmentAreas: cleantech, greentech, SaaS, B2B software, sustainability

name: Spring Capital
description: Spring Capital is a venture capital firm that operates two distinct funds: Seed and Growth. Our mission is to invest in exceptional early-stage companies in the Nordics & CEE+ and help them realize their full potential.
investmentAreas: deeptech, gaming, HRTech, edtech, sales tech, industry agnostic

name: Virtue Capital Fund
description: Virtue Ventures is a distinguished limited partnership fund registered in Estonia with a mission to create value for our investors by strategically investing in the rapidly growing fintech sector. Our primary focus lies with Quanloop, an innovative group of fintech companies operating in Estonia and Lithuania. By supporting Quanloop's vision, we contribute to the advancement of financial technology, enabling more efficient and accessible financial solutions for businesses and individuals across Europe.

name: Siena Secondary Fund
description: Siena Secondary Fund provides liquidity for early investors, founders and employees of high growth startups from the Nordics & CEE region. We target companies which are usually post series A, have solid business model and are still in high growth phase.
investmentAreas: Siena Secondary Fund provides liquidity for early investors, founders and employees of high growth startups from the Nordics & CEE region. We target companies which are usually post series A, have solid business model and are still in high growth phase.

name: TLG Ventures
description: Project Investments: As strategic investors in early stage blockchain projects, we invest between $100,000 to $5,000,000 dollars in startups that meet our criteria prior to ICO. Project Stewardship: In addition to project capital, we offer our expertise and advice to startups, and help guide them through the pitfalls of early stage growth. Project Promotions: As part of our commitment to projects we choose to back, TLG embarks on a promotional campaign for each startup prior to ICO. TLG Ventures has broad access to social media personalities and influencers that are able to leverage their platforms and bring positive media awareness to each project.

name: I Am The Fund
description: I Am The Fund is a VC investment firm focusing on early-stage startups. We care about your success, so in addition to investments, we provide portfolio companies with engineering, advisory, and access to a vast business network.
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Blockchain, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech, Information Technology, Software, Venture Capital

name: Netsolid Investments
description: NetSolid Investments is a venture capital and private equity firm that provides capital infusion and expertise investments to global early-stage MarTech companies. With capital infusion, we help entrepreneurs find new revenue streams, achieve operation efficiency, and get the best partners around the world.
investmentAreas: Advertising, Affiliate Marketing, Digital Marketing, Gambling, Gaming, SEO

name: Impulse Generator Fund
description: Impulse Generator Fund is a technology catalyst, allowing startups to get off the ground by materializing their MVPs and accelerating time to market. Impulse Generator Fund is a form of venture capital funding that provides startup companies and early stage businesses with technical expertise and strong international development support to fast-track their rise to the market entry threshold. The outcome-oriented funding is provided to companies that are believed to have exceptional long-term growth potential.

name: Krokodilli Kapital
description: At Krokodilli Kapital, we are on a mission to improve the quality of life, reduce our footprint on the planet and enable bright, passionate people to create useful products. We back early-stage startups that solve problems in complex value chains and leverage deep customer relationships. We have a keen eye for embedded finance and marketplace opportunities and have invested in businesses around fintech, proptech, clean energy and digital healthcare. We are intrinsically motivated by the opportunity to help our founders grow both personally and professionally as they build their companies. We develop our portfolio companies by supporting our founders and advising the teams on strategy, product, technology and operations.
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Asset Management, Impact Investing, Venture Capital

name: Server Partners
description: Server Partners is a home family office with a personal touch. We support the ideas and people behind them. Our main focus is on investment management.Nowadays, we are supporting Space technologies, metaverse, social projects, and other trends of the future.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Good Deed Education Fund
description: Good Deed Foundation is Launchpad for new and exiting social initiatives that have potential to influence our society. Since 2003 Good Deed Foundation (Heateo Sihtasutus) has promoted and supported social entrepreneurship via its portfolio and with great help from partner and volunteer network.

name: Lemonade Stand
description: Lemonade Stand is an early stage tech startup investment firm focusing on B2B investments in strong teams, technology, and traction. Led by Siim Teller, they support pre-revenue startups in the Baltics and Eastern Europe.

name: Specialist VC
description: We are a €50 million venture capital fund, focusing on investments into promising tech startups from pre-seed to A-rounds. Our main focuses are on B2B, SaaS, fintech and marketplaces. Usaldusfond Specialist VC Primary and Secondary Fund II is backed by BIF 2 – an initiative created by cooperation between the Republic of Estonia, the Republic of Latvia, the Republic of Lithuania and EIF.

name: Trigon Capital
description: Managing over €1 billion in assets, Trigon Capital Group is a holding company dedicated to driving growth across a diverse range of industries all linked together by a common purpose of creating a more environmentally sustainable future. Trigon Group has been operating in Central and Eastern Europe for over 30 years since its founding in 1994. We believe this region has exceptional growth potential as it converges with Western Europe and some of the strongest macroeconomic indicators in the world. We see exciting opportunities for our group to expand in the region going forward. Our team leverages both regional and global finance and investment, business development and related experience.

name: FStage
description: FStage is an early stage VC, disrupting the way investing happens for startups and for investors. We validate first, then invest, then support with mentoring. Our investors contribute with their skills and small ticket fundings. Reach out to talk details! We're a VC firm that validates entrepreneurs capable of disrupting the future. We don't train, nor push, nor drag anyone off from their best trajectory. We validate & support with expertise, mentoring, publicity & invest €50k.

name: Superangel
description: Superangel is early stage investment fund and company builder. We invest our time, experience and capital to help start and grow the next wave of European technology startups, focusing on "from founder to founder" concept where early stage capital is coupled with company building.

name: Tera Ventures
description: Tera Ventures is an international investment firm based in Estonia. Tera helps some of Europe's most disruptive technology companies scale and become global leaders. We back ambitious founders and their compelling visions at pre-seed and seed stage. Founded in 2016, Tera Ventures has 12 active investments in its first fund (that we previously managed under SmartCap). We are also proud of our previous exits from GrabCAD, Modesat, VitalFields, Startup Wise Guys, and others. The team at Tera Ventures consists of investors and advisors from around the world who have created exceptional value and personally made the journey from founders to acquisition or IPO of several digital tech companies. We believe in and strongly support founders and great teams and possess a very Silicon Valley-approach to helping our companies – we have worked in all weather conditions and life cycles of startups and are there to support our clients' success. We are tenacious, ambitious and experienced in making it happen.
investmentAreas: B2B, Finance, Financial Services, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Change Ventures
description: We back ambitious Baltic founders, both in Estonia, Latvia, or Lithuania, and the diaspora around the globe. Our investments range between €100K and €500K in pre-seed stage technology startups. Our partners have 45 years of operating experience between them that we bring to bear in supporting our portfolio and we aim to provide a founder-friendly, fast, and efficient investment process. Post-investment we support founders in getting to product-market fit and scaling the business, especially with our personal network of over 700 follow-on and co-investors around the globe.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: BlockGrounds
description: Exclusively focused on investing in blockchain technologies, the BlockGrounds Team is experienced in both technological and financial sides of this ecosystem.We have kept our vision from the start: The blockchain technology is holding the key to disrupt legacy businesses and create entirely new markets and business models.

name: Broadgate Capital
description: Broadgate Capital is an international fund manager with focus on real estate, developments, delivery of turn key projects and service solutions for the real estate industry within the Baltic States of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania. us extensive experience and a broad network of co-operation partners.

name: Karma Ventures
description:
Karma Ventures is a venture capital firm focused on investing in early-stage deep tech software startups across Europe. We back exceptional founders building defensible technology, typically at the late-seed or Series A stage.

 
Investment Focus:  
- Stage: Late-seed and Series A
- Geography: Pan-European
- Ticket: 1-5M

name: LIFT99
description: From founders to founders, LIFT99 helps startup entrepreneurs and bright minds from all over the world to elevate their businesses with the necessary know-how, network, and support. We are set to transform the way founders share expertise, learn, and grow. On one level we are moving towards that goal through strategically placed startup hubs located in Tallinn and Kyiv. Internationally we are uniting today's and tomorrow's founders within our Salto App and the Toolbox of Salto Network, built to connect founders and help their startups grow into unicorns. Keep an eye on our Salto Network page to find out more.
investmentAreas: Information Services, Information Technology, Service Industry

name: Kontaveit Group
description: We invest in game changers in the European and Asia markets.Kontaveit Group, accessible at kontaveitgroup.com, is a premier provider of comprehensive business solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of modern enterprises. Our company excels in delivering top-tier services across a variety of domains including technology, consulting, marketing, and finance. We are dedicated to empowering businesses with the tools and strategies they need to thrive in today's competitive landscape.
investmentAreas: Investment, Users Statistics, Data Analysis, UX Development, Voice Recognition
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Startup Wise Guys
description: Startup Wise Guys is a venture capital and private equity firm that invests in start ups, B2C and B2B. We are a diverse team of tech lovers, mentors, experts, and founders ourselves bound together by our passion to support founders on their entrepreneurial journey. We help to solve key challenges at every stage Dare to dream global. We’re a startup accelerator like no other, our optimized approach puts early stage startups on the map and catapults them into worldwide success.
investmentAreas: Augmented Reality, B2B, Cyber Security, FinTech, SaaS

name: NGI TETRA
description: NGI TETRA is dedicated to helping businesses accelerate their ideas. The Next Generation Internet initiative by the Digital Single Market of the European Commission. Building a European initiative for a Human Internet creating an Internet that respects human and societal values, privacy, participation and diversity, and offers new functionalities to support people’s real needs and address global sustainability challenges.
investmentAreas: Business Development, Finance, Financial Services, Professional Services

name: Tehnopol
description: Tehnopol is a research and service organisation providing support to startup and growing technology companies. The Tallinn Science Park Tehnopol foundation is a science and business campus which aims to advance technology-based entrepreneurship in Estonia, bring scientists and entrepreneurs together and provide suitable services and a suitable environment for the realisation of breakthrough business ideas.
investmentAreas: Consulting, Information Technology, Professional Services, Business incubator

name: Tallinn Business Incubators
description: Tallinn Business Incubators offer their services in four different areas dependent on the entrepreneur's development stage and goals. Tallinn Creative Incubator (TCI) was established in 2006 by the City of Tallinn with the aim of offering support measures to sustainable start-up businesses with an export potential. The mission TCI of is to provide a supportive environment while also improving the business competence of enterprises.
investmentAreas: Business Consulting, Facilities Management, Incubation Services, Event Management

name: Digital Invest
description: Digital Invest helps create innovative ideas, invests, designs, develops and promotes projects and businesses to achieve success. We have extensive experience in developing IT projects from the idea to full launch and guaranteed support. We create IT projects, put our soul and expertise into them. Each client is a partner for us and their success is our pride.

name: Wise Guys Cyber
description: Wise Guys Cyber is an acceleration program that focuses on defense AI and cybersecurity.We provide startups with strategic mentorship, funding opportunities, and access to a global network of industry experts. At Wise Guys Cyber, we empower entrepreneurs to develop cutting-edge solutions that address critical cybersecurity challenges effectively.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Business Development, Cyber Security, Information Technology

name: CEED Tech
description: CEED Tech is a consortium of five startup accelerators. We will provide all of the support that you need when it comes to fundraising and investment advice. We have amazing customer service as well.

name: Ajujaht
description: Ajujaht is an entrepreneurial competition where 100 best business ideas from the tiny Northern Europe nation. Ajujaht is Estonia's best-known start-up accelerator program. Teams participating in the brainhunt have the opportunity to bring their product or service to scaling and investment readiness with the help of a world-class accelerator program. The accelerator program has been created based on 14 years of brainstorming experience and considering the very elements that start-up companies need mos.

name: Alpine House Spring 2020
description: Alpine House Spring 2020 is a unique one-year long acceleration program for tech startups who are looking to build something big. Superangel is early stage investment fund and company builder. We invest our time, experience and capital to help start and grow the next wave of European technology startups, focusing on “from founder to founder” concept where early stage capital is coupled with company building. Early stage funding for the builders of world-changing technology in the Baltics and Nordics.
investmentAreas: Investment Management, Investment Fund, Business Development, Financial Services

name: Beamline Accelerator
description: We are the cleantech accelerator for cleantech startups. Investing in ambitious early-stage climate tech startups 60 000€ + accelerator program. Having defined cleantech in the region, Beamline is established to meet the needs of the market – there is a sudden growth in the number of specific cleantech startups and segments.
